revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 33.;Phamenoth 25:;Leontarous, daughter of Heron (granddaughter of Xiphis);;(in left margin: drachmas 4, obols 6)geometria for the 12th year drachmas 4, obol 1, surcharge obol 1.5, chalki 2, in total drachmas 4, obols 2.5, chalki 2;;Louppos, son of Horos, grandson of Menches, mother Tapapeis, drachmas 8;;Heron, son of Ekysis, grandson of Menandros, mother Herois, drachmas 8;;Imouthes, son of Keras, grandson of Menandros, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;Heron, son of Sabeinos, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Gaia, drachmas 12;;Sisois, son of Neilos, grandson of Euhemeros, mother Taeuhemeros, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Herieus, mother Anthia, drachmas 4;;Kastor alias Sabeinos, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Satabous, mother Melitous, drachmas 8;;Sarapion, son of Phaesis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tanais, drachmas 4;;Sisois, son of Onnophris, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Horos, son of Petaus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tauris, drachmas 4;;Hareotes, son of Phaesis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tanais, drachmas 20;;Mysthes, son of Naaraus, grandson of Petheus, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 8;;Hatres, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;of the aforementioned demosioi priests dealing in wool;;drachmas 12, surcharges obols 5;;Apollonios, son of Euhemeros (Apollonios Kyllos);;orchard taxes for the 12th year: apomoira drachmas 3, obols 4.5, tax on produce of oil obols 3.5, naubion obols 2.5, surcharges drachma 1;;eparourion drachmas 2, obols 3, surcharges obol 1, chalki 2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 8, obols 3.5, chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 9, obols 2, chalki 2, surcharges 3.5, chalki 2, in total drachmas 10;;Apollonios, son of Polydeukes (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 153);;orchard taxes for the 12th year: apomoira drachmas 2, obols 3, tax on the produce of oil obols 2, chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5, chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1, obol 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5, chalki 2, in total drachmas 5, obols 4, chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6, obol 1.5, surcharges obols 2.5, in total drachmas 6, obols 4;;Euhemeros, son of Apollonios;;orchard taxes for the 12th year: apomoira drachmas 3, obols 4.5, tax on the produce of oil obols 3.5, naubion obol 2.5, surcharges drachma 1;;eparourion drachmas 2, obols 3, surcharges obol 1, chalki 2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 8, obols 3.5, chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 9, obols 2, chalki 2, surcharges obols 3.5, chalki 2, in total drachmas 10;;in total for the day drachmas 168, obols 20;;(Phamenoth) 26 liekwise: ;Hatres, son of Harpagathos (Hatres, son of Keras);;orchard taxes for the 12th year: apomoira drachmas 4, obols 3, chalki 2, tax on the produce of oil obols 4, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1, obol 1;;eparourion drachmas 3, chalki 2, surcharges obol 1.5, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 10 obols 2 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 11 obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 4.5, in total drachmas 12 obol 0.5, chalki 2;;Kastor, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Kommonis, drachmas 16, obols 28;;Ptollas the younger, son of Teberis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 221);;Apollodoros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 184);;Ptollas, son of Teberis along with Apollodoros, father of Sambous;; (Akoution);;orchard taxes for the 12th year: apomoira drachmas 2, obols 4.5, tax on the produce of oil obols 2.5, naubion obol 1.5, chalki 2 surcharges obols 4, chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1, obols 5, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5, chalki 2, in total drachmas 6, obol 1.5, chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6, obols 5, chalki 2, surcharges obols 2.5, chalki 2, in total drachmas 7, obols 2."
